description2: The F&D PA200 60W Bluetooth Party Speaker is a powerful and portable speaker that is perfect for any party or gathering. It features a 12-inch woofer and two 3-inch tweeters that deliver rich, full sound. The PA200 also has a built-in 11.1V/8000mAh (88. Wh) battery that provides up to 6 hours of playtime on a single charge. Featuring a sleek and portable design, the F&D PA200 is built to be easily transported wherever the party takes you. Whether you’re hosting a backyard barbecue, a beach party, or a small indoor gathering, this speaker is ready to provide the entertainment. With its built-in Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily connect your smartphone, tablet, or other Bluetooth-enabled devices to the F&D PA200. Stream your favorite playlists, pump up the volume, and let the music fill the air. No need for messy cables or complicated setups. The F&D PA200 packs a punch with its impressive sound output. Equipped with a powerful 20W speaker system, this party speaker delivers clear, dynamic audio that will get everyone moving. From thumping bass lines to crisp highs, every beat and note will be heard with clarity. But the F&D PA200 doesn’t stop at just audio. It also comes with built-in LED lights that add a vibrant visual element to your party. The multi-colored lights sync with the music, creating a pulsating light show that adds to the overall excitement and sets the mood for a memorable party experience. Not only is the F&D PA200 great for parties, but it also offers versatility for various occasions. It features a built-in FM radio, so you can tune in to your favorite stations and enjoy your preferred radio shows or sports broadcasts. Additionally, it offers multiple connectivity options, including USB and AUX inputs, allowing you to connect devices without Bluetooth compatibility. The F&D PA200 is designed with convenience in mind. It comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that offers hours of playtime, ensuring that the party doesn’t stop abruptly. It also features easy-to-use controls on the top of the speaker, allowing you to adjust the volume, switch between modes, and control the LED lights effortlessly. In summary, the F&D PA200 Bluetooth Party Speaker is a compact and powerful audio solution that brings the party to life. With its wireless connectivity, impressive sound output, synchronized LED lights, and portability, it’s the ultimate companion for your party needs. So gather your friends, turn up the volume, and let the F&D PA200 create an unforgettable party experience. These speakers offer 1 year of warranty.

This big-sounding, yet easy to carry speaker is waterproof and dustproof, so you can take it anywhere in any weather. And with 12 hours of battery life, you can party 'til the sun goes down—or comes up—wherever the music moves you. Use PartyBoost to link multiple compatible speakers. The Flip 6 comes in a variety of cool colors.
price: Current Price: Rs.16,500, Original Price: Rs.
description2: LOUDER, MORE POWERFUL SOUND The beat goes on with the JBL Flip 6 2-way speaker system, engineered to deliver loud, crystal clear, powerful sound. Its racetrack-shaped woofer delivers exceptional low frequencies and midrange, while a separate tweeter produces crisp, clear high-frequencies. Flip 6 also features optimized dual passive radiators for deep bass, fine-tuned with using Harman's advanced algorithm.  IP67 WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF To the pool. To the park. JBL Flip 6 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.  12 HOURS OF PLAYTIME Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. JBL Flip 6 gives you up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge.

short_description: Grab and go Take big JBL Pro sound wherever you go. The bold, colorful JBL Go 4 ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker fits in the palm of your hand, delivering clear, loud JBL Pro Sound with rich, punchy bass. Its newly redesigned integrated loop makes it easy to bring anywhere, and the variety of colorways means you can choose one that fits your vibe. Plus it's waterproof and dustproof, so it loves to go outside. And up to 7 hours of playtime means it will keep the good times rolling throughout a fun day trip or an evening chilling under the stars. Pair two Go 4's for stereo sound, or wirelessly connect multiple JBL Auracast-enabled speakers for even bigger sound. Crank it up and let your music take you anywhere.
price: Current Price: Rs., Original Price: Rs.
description2: Ultra-portable JBL Pro Sound with punchier bass Don't let its little size fool you. The JBL Go 4 packs a serious musical punch, delivering big JBL Pro Sound with punchy bass. Your friends won't believe how much great JBL Pro Sound comes out of such a small speaker.  Up to 7 hours of playtime plus 2 hours with Playtime Boost Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. JBL Go 4 gives you up to 7 hours of playtime on a single charge. Simply tap Playtime Boost to prolong the playtime, adding up to 2 hours to your battery life. It tunes and optimizes the performance for louder and crisper sound.  Waterproof and dustproof The JBL Go 4's IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating ensures this portable speaker can handle almost any environment, from a poolside party to a seaside picnic.
In the Box:
1 x JBL Go 4

description2: Feel Every Beat With Logitech Portable Speaker S125I The Logitech Portable Speaker S125i is a low-cost speaker with a built-in dock. The S125i supports all docking iPod models (excluding the 3rd generation), as well as connecting other portable music devices via the auxiliary line-in. The speaker has a Bass Boost button that, with a simple touch, brings the beat out in your music. Adaptability The Logitech S125I speaker is small and portable, so you can take it with you everywhere you go. Life of the Batteries On battery power alone, you can listen for up to 10 hours (batteries not included). It may also be powered by four AA batteries (not included), allowing you to take it with you wherever you go. Furthermore, the S125i can run for up to 10 hours only on battery power. AC power is also available thanks to the supplied power supply. Boosting the bass With just a touch of the Bass button on the Logitech Portable Speaker S125I, you can feel the beat even more. Compatibility with iPod Any docking iPod will dock and play in S125I Logitech Speaker because it is universally compatible (except 3rd gen). The auxiliary line-in can be used to connect all other portable audio devices that have been certified by Apple as "Made for iPod." short_description: Immerse yourself in a theater-quality audio experience in the comfort of your home from this Logitech Z906 5.1 Surround Sound Speaker System 5.1 speaker system. 1000 Watts peak/500 Watts RMS power delivers powerful surround sound that is THX Certified to bring you a premium audio experience as well as designed to decode Dolby Digital and DTS encoded soundtracks for premium movie and music playback.

description2: Logitech Z906. The THX Certified Powerful 5.1 speaker! Logitech Z906 5.1 Surround Sound Speaker System THX-certified speaker system makes converting any space into a home theater a breeze. Every tire screech, footstep, and rumbling are captured in 5.1 discrete channels of powerful, realistic surround sound, just as the studio intended. THX Certified Logitech Z906 5.1 Surround Sound Speaker has met strict performance standards to achieve THX certification. It’s your ultimate assurance of a cinematic sound experience. Amazing Surround Sound Designed from the ground up so that you get the most immersive surround sound experience possible. The Logitech Z906 5.1 speaker system is designed to decode Dolby Digital and DTS encoded soundtracks and has received THX Certification, ensuring a high-quality audio experience. Watts Of Powerful Sound 1000 Watts peak/500 Watts RMS power delivers rich audio and booming bass so that you can enjoy an auditory experience that brings every detail to life, from the noise of the crowd to the footsteps just behind you. The true sound that you can hear and feel. Versatile Setup Supports multiple inputs at the same time like 3.5mm, RCA, six-channel direct, digital coaxial, and optical inputs. Using the control console or the remote control you can select the audio input. Integrated Controls From the control panel or the wireless remote control, independently alter the volume levels of each satellite speaker and the subwoofer, as well as access power and mute. Choose between 2.1, 4.1, or 3D surround sound to customize your listening experience. Surround sound with 3D stereo Logitech Z906 speakers convert the two-channel stereo from your favorite old movies, music, and games into an immersive surround sound experience. Also, check out Logitech Z607 5.1 Surround Sound Speaker HERE!

description2: Dynamic 6W Speaker with Exceptional HD Sound Quality: The Promate Hook wearable speaker has a 6W speaker with a rich bass response and an excellent wide range of audio quality. This compact speaker delivers sound way beyond its size, with custom-designed drivers producing clear highs. Concert-like 360-Degree Surround Sound: The wearable, neckband design of the Hook provides an excellent bass effect. High-definition stereo and impressive 360-degree surround sound volume take you into experiencing the world of music. Just wear it and enjoy it completely. Skin-Friendly Silicone with Lightweight Design: This neckband speaker can be adjusted to fit your neckline and rest on your shoulders providing a comfortable and secure fit. Because of the silicone, skin-friendly make you can enjoy these headphones with utmost comfort for long durations. The lightweight design makes Hook a very portable accessory to use while traveling or even while working out/ running. Faster Pairing with Bluetooth v5.0: This Bluetooth wearable speaker uses the v5.0 version, which provides efficiency and better connectivity with a working range of up to 10m. This latest Bluetooth technology also provides faster pairing, a more stable connection, and universal compatibility with epic sound quality. 9 Hours Impressive Playing Time: Hook neckband speaker provides a stunning 8-9 hours of continuous music time with no disturbance. Now, no need to worry about the speaker's battery when you are in the mood to listen to music. Have a long hour of enjoyment with Hook. Built-In Mic for High-Quality Calling: Make and receive crystal clear calls at the touch of a button with the built-in mic with precise voice pickup. Keep your phone in your pocket and your head up to the world with easy access to all calls. Long-Lasting Power with 600mAh Battery Capacity: Built-in 600mAh rechargeable lithium battery recharged within 2-3 hours. No need to worry about the speaker's battery. Have a long 8-9 hours of enjoyment with our stunning wireless wearable speaker. Easy Re-Charge with USB-C™ Port: You can easily power up your Hook Speaker with the in-built USB-C™ charging Port which provides super-fast charging. You can use a Type-C™ cable to power up this device and avoid carrying multiple wires. Button Control Feature for Hands-Free Function: Buttons are placed on the speaker to change, pause, play, and control the volume of your music. Enjoy hands-free call access as well. Now have complete control at your fingertips with this wireless wearable speaker. Universal Compatibility: The Promate Hook is compatible with all Bluetooth-enabled devices such as iPhone 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 12 Mini, Samsung Galaxy S22/S21/S20/S10, Galaxy A52 5G, Samsung Galaxy Note 20 series, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2, Google Pixel 5, Google Pixel 4A, Oppo Find X3 Pro, OnePlus 9 series, Xiaomi Mi 11, Sony Xperia 1 III and more.

Introducing the Ultima Rock Wireless Speaker, where style meets superior sound. Engineered for exceptional performance, this portable stereo speaker boasts Bluetooth V5.3 connectivity with a range of up to 10 meters. Immerse yourself in a rich audio experience with 12W RMS stereo sound, powered by dual 2" fullrange drivers and two built-in passive bass radiators.

The speaker's high-quality plastic build, accented with a soft fabric finish, adds a touch of elegance. Enjoy the convenience of portability with a compact design and a playƟme of up to 12 hours at 60% volume. The RGB LED lights on both sides not only enhance the aesthetic but also set the mood for your music. With TWS functionality, you can connect two Rock speakers for a powerful stereo effect, delivering a total output of 24W. The speaker is equipped with a 2200mAh battery, Type-C charging port, and IPX5 water resistance for durability.

Navigate seamlessly with easy-to-use button controls for volume, playback, calls, and more. Compatible with various devices, the UlƟma Rock comes with a complete package, including charging and AUX cables, a user manual, a catalog, a sticker, and a warranty card. Available in sleek Black & Blue, this speaker is your perfect companion for on-the go entertainment.
